object.name: (a massive suit of charcoal black armor)

mobs.long_desc: A comfortable, purple-striped bean bag sits here.
mobs.desc: Made of tiny dried beans and covered with the hide of a rare purple-striped demon, these bean bags are of the highest quality.  Collapsing on one makes a nice squish, comfortably molding itself against the contours of your body.  It seems like you could probably move around on it, exploring the boundries of the GoT clan hall.

mobs.keywords: pastry table dispenser vendor pastry_table GUILD_MOB GoT_MOB
mobs.long_desc: A pastry vending table rests against the western wall.
mobs.desc: A mahogany table stands against the western wall.  It has a glass cover, under which is a good selection of delicious pastries.  By simply touching the image of the desired pastry and inserting the correct coinage into a slot, the pastry is magically created, fresh and hot!  What amazing magic!  Carved into the table are the words, "Property of the Guardians of Truth".

mobs.long_desc: A tall slender innkeeper beckons you down the hall.
mobs.desc: Blonde haired and blue eyed, this rather tall and obviously slender woman places herself before a long hallway waiting to show clan members to their private chambers.

objects.ground: A fountain of fresh milk flows here.

extras.text: A small marble fountain streaked with gold sits in the corner, magically flowing with fresh, warm milk.  It smells excellent and would perfectly complement everything from cereal to cookies.  An inscription at the bottom says "Guardians of Truth, 2006".

objects.ground: A pastry with bird feet sticking out has been dropped here.

extras.text: Made of a thin dough with a partridge inside (feet sticking up) and including such other ingredients as nutmeg, ginger, chopped marjoram, new butter, and saffroned sour lemon slices, the poupelin is a legendary pastry.  The secrets of its baking are only known to a select few in the world.  Such a pastry is truly a work of art!

objects.ground: A chicken pot pie has been left here, smelling delicious!

extras.text: Set in a brown ceramic dish and steaming hot, this pot pie smells of chicken, herbs, freshly baked crust and other tastiness.  It looks both nutritious and delicious.  Mmm.

objects.ground: A single slice of blueberry pie is here, begging to be eaten.

extras.text: Crispy browned crust sprinkled with sugar lines the hot blueberry filling of this freshly sliced pie.  It would probably burn one's mouth and stain it purple with the hot berry juice, but that's half the fun, isn't it?

objects.ground: A puffy pastry sits here, waiting to be eaten.

extras.text: Tasty and delicious, the cream puff would go well with coffee.  Light and fluffy but filled with thick cream, the cream puff is a standard of pastry shops everywhere.  The dough swirls up, cloudlike, into a triangular shape that pleases the eyes as well as the taste buds.

objects.ground: A golden-white portal glimmers against the southern wall.
A plain pair of glasses rest here, forgotten by someone.

extras.text: This is just a plain pair of glasses until worn.  Once placed over the eyes, they begin to glow with a golden light and transform into a thin line of energy that hums for a moment and then seemingly vanishes except for a small glyph representing "Truth" that can be seen deep in the pupils of the wearer.

objects.short: a massive suit of charcoal black armor
objects.ground: A massive suit of charchoal black armor stands lifeless in the corner.

extras.text: A massive suit of very sturdy armor, charcoal black, is prompted up as a trophy. A large plume protrudes from the top of the armored helmet while it's chestplate is engraved with what appears to be an unholy symbol that looks that of the sky god himself.

objects.ground: A piece of parchment titled with the initals GoT lies here abandoned.

extras.text: This deed entitles the clan known as GoT to the following items as paid for in their initial construction costs so long as they continue to pay maintainance costs of 10% of the total construction costs by the 5th of each month. At the time dues are collected the seal on this lease shall be updated to reflect the date the next collection shall take place. Note- Lease agreements pay be inspected at any time to verify that all dues are up-to-date. Clan Construction details follow and a Holy Seal is placed at the bottem.

The following are details surround the costs and maintain of the clans hall and item: Inital Construction cost (2 rooms)   - 15K Additional rooms (1)                 -  3K Inn/Innkeeper                        -  8K Fountain (Milk filled)               -  2K Clan Mobs (Bean bag chairs)          -  3K Shop with four basic items (table)   -  7K One basic clan item                  -  3K Improved Ability on Item (1 DR)      -  5K Portal back to town                  -  Free  - Exception because clan is on SoCo Herlequin Suit of Armor              -  Free  - Gift from Acerite -------------------------------------------- Total                                - 46K Upkeep is 10% of total cost          - 4.6K Note- All prices are in platinum.

A holy seal is stamped at the bottom of this parchment it reads: &9&b              / \&0 &3            /     \&0 &3&b          /         \&0 &3&b        /             \&0 &8       <      GoT      >&0 &8        \             /&0 &3&b          \         /&0 &3&b            \     /&0 &3              \ /&0 Dues paid through: January 5 Collected by: Kourrya

shops.no_such_item1: %s Sorry, I don't stock that item.
shops.no_such_item2: %s You don't seem to have that.
shops.do_not_buy: %s I don't trade in such items.

triggers.name: GoT_Arch_Exit_Trigger
triggers.commands: wait 1 if %actor.wearing[1406]% * Check to see if the door field is open/unlocked, if not lets * set a variable and unlock/open it.  If so, close/lock it * and unset the variable. if %got_hall_open% != 1 * Door closed and locked, lets open it! set got_hall_open 1 global got_hall_open wdoor 1400 south flags acd wdoor 1400 south room 2610 wdoor 1400 south name entry arch wdoor 1400 south description A large archway opens up to one of Caelia's southern caravan routes. wecho The barrier protecting the entry archway flares momentarily as it powers down. * create the other side and link. wdoor 2610 north flags acd wdoor 2610 north room 1400 wdoor 2610 north description A large archway leads into an inviting, stone structure. wat 2610 wecho The northern archway's protective barrier flares momentarily as it powers down. else * Door open, lets close and lock it! set got_hall_open 0 global got_hall_open wdoor 1400 south flags abcd wdoor 1400 south room 2610 wdoor 1400 south description A large archway is protected by a near-ethereal, humming, force field. wecho The barrier protecting the entry archway flares momentarily as it powers up. * create the other side and link wdoor 2610 north flags abcd wdoor 2610 north room 1400 wdoor 2610 north name entry arch wdoor 2610 north description The archway leading into the structure is protected by a force field. wat 2610 wecho The northern archway's protective barrier flares momentarily as it powers up. endif else * No Eyes of Truth, no exit! endif

triggers.name: GoT_Arch_Entry_Trigger
triggers.commands: wait 1 if %actor.wearing[1406]% * Check to see if the door field is open/unlocked, if not lets * set a variable and unlock/open it.  If so, close/lock it * and unset the variable. if %got_hall_open% != 1 * Door closed and locked, lets open it! set got_hall_open 1 global got_hall_open wdoor 1400 south flags acd wdoor 1400 south room 2610 wdoor 1400 south name entry arch wdoor 1400 south description A large archway opens up to one of Caelia's southern caravan routes. wat 1400 wecho The barrier protecting the entry archway flares momentarily as it powers down. * create the other side and link. wdoor 2610 north flags acd wdoor 2610 north room 1400 wdoor 2610 north description A large archway leads into an inviting, stone structure. wecho The northern archway's protective barrier flares momentarily as it powers down. else * Door open, lets close and lock it! set got_hall_open 0 global got_hall_open wdoor 1400 south flags abcd wdoor 1400 south room 2610 wdoor 1400 south description A large archway is protected by a near-ethereal, humming, force field. wat 1400 wecho The barrier protecting the entry archway flares momentarily as it powers up. * create the other side and link wdoor 2610 north flags abcd wdoor 2610 north room 1400 wdoor 2610 north name entry arch wdoor 2610 north description The archway leading into the structure is protected by a force field. wecho The northern archway's protective barrier flares momentarily as it powers up. endif else * No Eyes of Truth, no exit! endif

triggers.name: GoT recall 1401
triggers.commands: if %arg% /= truth ||  %arg% /= eye || %arg% /= eyes osend %actor% You gently rub %self.shortdesc% oechoaround %actor% %actor.name% gently rubs %self.shortdesc% wait 1s oechoaround %actor% A bright white portal appears, and draws %actor.name%, in. osend %actor% A white light appears and embraces you, to your very soul. wait 2s oteleport %actor% 1401 osend %actor% The bright lights embrace you only for a moment before setting you back into your world. osend %actor% The words "Guard the Truth well" repeat in your mind. oechoaround %actor% A bright white portal flashes into view as %actor.name%, steps out of it. osend %actor% You blink and realize you are not where you started. wait 1s oforce %actor% look elseif osend %actor% Huh?!? endif

rooms.name: Entrance to a Grand Hall
rooms.description: A spacious hall with large skylights to let in the sun opens up, its bright walls offering a feeling of safety and comfort.  Upon entering the well-lit hall, six portraits seem to dominate the eastern wall.  A pyromancer, paladin, thief, cleric, ranger and priest are depicted, all involved in some act of heroism.  A closer look at each picture may reveal more detail. The hall's exit is south, while the north leads into a colorful lounge.

South.description: A large archway is protected by a near-ethereal, humming, force field.

extras.text: This person is a slacker who never sent Aurius his character description.

This picture shows a young man battling a huge white dragon, with shadows of other heroes in the background.  The young man is pale of skin and has short, black hair and bright green eyes.  The holy markings on his raiment and his deity's symbol around his neck proclaim him to be a priest.  A small plaque at the bottom of his picture reads "Aurius Lord Tepes, Scourge of Evil".

rooms.name: A Hallowed Lounge
rooms.description: This colorful room is large and somewhat messy.  A golden banner reading "Guardians of Truth" is hung on the eastern wall, with the "Got GoT?  " insignia scrawled underneath it in white chalk.  Several bean bags litter the floor, looking quite comfy to recline on.  A small bookshelf lies near the doors to the north, full of interesting-looking volumes.  A few werelights float around, casting a warm yellow glow on everything in the room.

rooms.name: A Dark Hallway
rooms.description: A small landing separates the stairs that lead downward into the lower halls and a large hallway which shows several doorways. The landing itself has several windows, all blocked out by large drapes making this area rather dark and somewhat ominous yet very soothing to the weary.
